duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate and correct errors on timecards for all NASA Centers and notify supervisors or employees to rectify the timecards.
Request, validate, and maintain supporting documentation from employees charging military and court leave.
Partner with NASA Centers and Agency to create, edit, and delete messages of the Day in WebTADS.
Verify the completion and approval of all NASA employee timecards at the end of the pay period.
Provide guidance to NASA employees and supervisors on completing timecards for various situations.
Partner with the NSSC Personnel Action Team to ensure personnel actions are processed.
Manually create and track timecards for new hires when necessary.
Perform payroll procedures to lockout time and attendance system.
